content: make a splash with the **hooked on the sea 6 crochet ocean animal amigurumi pattern collection** this fun and playful set includes 6 adorable crochet ocean animal amigurumi patterns made with the signature wheat stitch™ 1 ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ special offer alert add any pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ say hello to the **wheat stitch™ octopus** an irresistibly cute squishy sea creature made with the cozy texture of the wheat stitch 2 this little amigurumi is a true one-piece wonder worked in the round with zero sewing required we ll start at the top crocheting the body in the signature wheat stitch pop in the safety eyes and then dive right into the twisty curly tentacles from there we ll finish off the base add some stuffing and cinch it all closed it s quick seamless and totally adorable the kind of project that s just as fun to make as it is to squish one of the great things about crocheting amigurumi is the freedom to experiment with any yarn you love from fingering weight to bulky simply adjust your hook size to match your yarn choice and have fun creating all kinds of sea friends a video tutorial is included with this pattern crochet hook g 4 0mm - or size to meet gauge 3 notions removable stitch markers 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 fiberfill 7 safety eyes 8 string for tags 9 yarn herrschners my ami 10 55% acrylic/45% cotton blend 120yds/50g yarn quantities red 80 yds yarn substitutes brava worsted 11 100% premium acrylic 218yds/100g herrschners worsted 8 12 100% acrylic 489yds/226g dishie 13 100% cotton 190yds/100g abbreviations chain - chain blo- back loop only flo - front loop only rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet decrease - single_crochet two together slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es ws - wrong sider gauge not critical for this design not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 14 sizes one size 4 5 x 4 skill level advanced beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 15 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 16 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 17 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 18 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 19 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 20 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2025 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express
